Lookup table

Source: R/lookup_table.R
lookup_table.Rd

Numerica value and corresponding description. Can be used as reference, or be used to join with parsed json data.

lookup_table

Format

A list with 6 elements, each a data.frame with numeric id and corresponding description

stateID

State abbreviation and name

billStatusDict

Bill final status

billSponsorDict

Sponsor type

billProgressDict

Important events of bill progress

billTypeDict

Type of bill

billTextTypeDict

Type of bill text document

mimeTypeDict

Bill text document mime type

For further details, see LegiScan API documentation https://legiscan.com/gaits/documentation/legiscan
